Description: folder name of the dataset to be used
select the objective function. Options are: ``total_cost``, i.e. net-present cost, and ``total_emissions``
sense of the optimization. Options are: ``minimize`` and ``maximize``
folder where the output files will be saved
if true, overwrite existing files in the output folder
output format of the optimization results. Currently only ``h5`` is supported
If true, additional data such as solving time, number of iterations etc. will be saved
additional settings for the time series aggregation algorithm
